productDescription: The Original BiBS are handmade in the Netherlands, hence every piece is unique meant to support creatives on a daily basis.

optionalInfo.material:
100% Cotton Twill. 
Logo marks are embroidered on the back of the zipped chest pocket as well as lasered on all buttons.
optionalInfo.fit: A soft cotton twill fabric and oversized fit ensures a comfy feel and provides room for extra layers. You can safely store and access items such as your phone, valuables or tools in the zipped chest pocket and hammer loop. However, be creative and make use in your own needs! The adjustable straps are there to adjust the size accordingly.
optionalInfo.production: The Original BiBS are handmade in the Netherlands.
